## useBurnNFT() function

Burn an NFT owned by the connected wallet

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useBurnNFT } from "@thirdweb-dev/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { mutateAsync: burn, isLoading, error } = useBurnNFT(program);

  return <button onClick={() => burn("...")}>Burn</button>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useBurnNFT(
  program: RequiredParam<NFTCollection | NFTDrop>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult<
  import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").TransactionResult,
  unknown,
  string,
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                          | Description                              |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| program   | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;NFTCollection &#124; NFTDrop&gt; | The NFT program instance to burn NFTs on |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult&lt;import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").TransactionResult, unknown, string, unknown&gt;
